attributes.additional_details: They are dangerous and they have killed people
attributes.background: Get rid of the xl bully dog breed and ban them forever

rejection.details:
The Government has already announced that it will ban ‘American XL Bully’ dogs. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-ban-american-xl-bully

Before the ban was announced we published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make XL Bully a banned dog breed in the Dangerous Dogs Act: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642809
